ovdesc.p: This is a parameter file which allows the bank user to configure the details of external user relation actions including OFS.SOURCE id, log for enquiries and list of applications, versions and function. It has a single record SYSTEM to trace the required applications/functions launched from the OFS.SOURCE .

desc.p: Specifies the version name for which the details should be logged, when it is accessed by the external user.
Specifies the application name for which the details should be logged, when it is accessed by the external user.
Specifies whether to enable or disable cache logging for the associated OFS.SOURCE configured in CPR.OFS.SOURCE.
Specifies whether to enable or disable the logging of enquiry request received from the external user.
Specifies the function name for which the details should be logged, when it is accessed by the external user.
Specifies the OFS.SOURCE id to be configured.
